revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/org.eclipse.xtext.tests/src/org/eclipse/xtext/xtext/generator/GrammarAccessExtensions2Test.java b/org.eclipse.xtext.tests/src/org/eclipse/xtext/xtext/generator/GrammarAccessExtensions2Test.java
index 4381e15bc..ad5c8043a 100644
--- a/org.eclipse.xtext.tests/src/org/eclipse/xtext/xtext/generator/GrammarAccessExtensions2Test.java
+++ b/org.eclipse.xtext.tests/src/org/eclipse/xtext/xtext/generator/GrammarAccessExtensions2Test.java

@@ -70,15 +70,15 @@ public class GrammarAccessExtensions2Test {
 				"	| '?:';\n";
 		String expected = 
 				"//OpOther:" + NL +
-				"//	  '->'" + NL +
-				"//	| '..<'" + NL +
-				"//	| '>' '..'" + NL +
-				"//	| '..'" + NL +
-				"//	| '=>'" + NL +
-				"//	| '>' (=>('>' '>') | '>')" + NL +
-				"//	| '<' (=>('<' '<') | '<' | '=>')" + NL +
-				"//	| '<>'" + NL +
-				"//	| '?:';";
+				"//      '->'" + NL +
+				"//    | '..<'" + NL +
+				"//    | '>' '..'" + NL +
+				"//    | '..'" + NL +
+				"//    | '=>'" + NL +
+				"//    | '>' (=>('>' '>') | '>')" + NL +
+				"//    | '<' (=>('<' '<') | '<' | '=>')" + NL +
+				"//    | '<>'" + NL +
+				"//    | '?:';";
 		firstRuleIsConvertedTo(grammar, expected);
 	}
